mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ISNULL((SELECT PJT_NM FROM T_SM3000 WHERE T_SM3000.PJT_CD = A.PJT_CD),' ') PJT_NM, A.OUT_CORP, A.OUT_ITEM, A.CONTRACT_NM, A.DEPT_CD, A.CONTRACT_DATE, A.CONTRACT_AMT, B.CUST_NM, D.LEVEL2_NM E_RMK_NM, E.DEPT_NM, F.LEVEL2_NM OUT_ITEM_NM, A.PJT_CD, (CASE ISNULL(G.PJT_E_GBN,'') WHEN '' THEN '진행' WHEN ' ' THEN '진행' WHEN '1' THEN '준공' WHEN '2' THEN '중도타절' END) PJT_E_GBN_NM, (CASE WHEN ISNULL(G.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT,0) != 0 AND ISNULL(G.PJT_CONTRACT_AMT,0) != 0 THEN (ISNULL(G.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT,0)/ISNULL(G.PJT_CONTRACT_AMT,0))*100 ELSE 0 END) PJT_CONTRACT_PER, G.G_YAREA_P, G.G_YAREA_M, G.BUILD_TYPE, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '170' AND LEVEL2_CD = G.BUILD_TYPE) BUILD_TYPE_NM FROM T_P12000 A, T_AC0300 B, (SELECT * FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '130') D, T_SC1010 E, (SELECT * FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '160') F, T_P11000 G WHERE A.OUT_CORP *= B.CUST_CD AND A.E_RMK *= D.LEVEL2_CD AND A.DEPT_CD *= E.DEPT_CD AND A.OUT_ITEM *= F.LEVEL2_CD AND A.PJT_CD *= G.PJT_CD ) A, (SELECT * FROM SF_SC1010('03', '', #{inDeptCd},'')) D WHERE A.DEPT_CD = D.DEPT_CD AND A.CONTRACT_DATE LIKE #{inContractDate} + '%' AND A.PJT_CD LIKE '%' + #{inPjtCd} +'%' AND A.PJT_NM LIKE '%' + #{inPjtNm} +'%' AND A.OUT_ITEM LIKE '%' + #{inOutItem} + '%' AND A.CUST_NM LIKE '%' + #{inCustNm} + '%' AND A.CONTRACT_NM LIKE '%' + #{inContractNm} + '%' AND A.BUILD_TYPE LIKE '%' + #{inBuildType} + '%' ORDER BY A.DEPT_CD, A.PJT_CD, A.OUT_ITEM, A.OUT_CORP

SELECT C.LEVEL2_NM as OUT_ITEM_NM ,B.CUST_NM as CUST_NM ,A.contract_amt as CONTRACT_AMT from T_P12000 A ,T_AC0300 B ,(SELECT * FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'J' AND LEVEL1_CD = '160')C WHERE A.out_corp *= B.CUST_CD and A.OUT_ITEM *= C.LEVEL2_CD and a.pjt_cd LIKE '%'+#{PJT_CD}+'%' ORDER BY OUT_ITEM
